summary: After 42 years, feisty and delightful lesbian couple Edie and Thea are finally getting married. From the early '60s to the present day, the tireless community activists persevere through ... See full summary »
director: Directors: Susan Muska, Gréta Olafsdóttir (as Gréta Ólafsdóttir)
title: Edie & Thea: Un largo compromiso
